1a -

a) C[1,6] (1010)   =	001010   -> 110101
b) C[1,8] (1101)   =	00001101 -> 11110010
c) C[2,6] (101001) =	101001   -> 010110   -> 010111
d) C[2,7] (101111) =	0101111  -> 1010000  -> 1010001
e) C[2,8] (110100) =	00110100 -> 11001011 -> 11001100

2a -

a) C[1,6]  321  (4)  = 111001      (2) = 000110
b) C[1,8]  B2   (16) = 10110010    (2) = 01001101
c) C[2,6]  231  (4)  = 101101      (2) = 010010      -> 010011
d) C[2,10] 146  (8)  = 0001100110  (2) = 1110011001  -> 1110011010
e) C[2,8]  6F   (16) = 01101111    (2) = 10010000    -> 100100013

3a -

a) 10110   (2) = 10101   -> 01010  = 10 (10)
b) 110011  (2) = 110010  -> 001101 = 13 (10)
c) 100100  (2) = 100011  -> 011100  (2)
d) 1011011 (2) = 1011010 -> 0100101 (2)
e) 1110011 (2) = 1110010 -> 0001101 = D (16)

4a -

a) 11001 - 1101 = 01101 -> 10010 -> 10011 + 11001 = 01100
b) 101.1101 - 10.01    = 010.0100 -> 101.1011 -> 101.1100 + 101.1101 = 11.1001
c) 321 (4)  - 231 (4)  = 111001 (2) - 101101(2) = 010010 -> 010011 + 111001 = 001100 (2) = 030(4)
d) 376 (8)  - 267 (8)  = 011111110 (2) - 010110111 (2) = 101001000 -> 101001001 + 011111110 = 001000111 (2) = 107 (8)
e) 7D2 (16) - A51 (16) = 0111|1101|0010 (2) - 1010|0101|0001 (2) = 010110101110 -> 010110101111 + 011111010010 = 1101|1000|0001 (2) = D81 (negativo)

5a - 

a) 110101   (2)  - 1011    (2)  = 001011 -> 110101 + 110101 = 101010
b) 101.1001 (2)  - 3.1     (8)  = 011.0001 (2) -> 100.1110 -> 100.1111 + 101.1001 ≃ 10.1000 ≃ 10.0110011 (valor real)
c) 213      (4)  - 3D      (16) = 100111 (2) - 00111101 (2) = 00100111 - 00111101 =  11000010 -> 11000011 + 00100111 = 11101010 (negativo)
d) C5		(16) - 1011001 (2)  = 11000101 (2) - 1011001 = 01011001 -> 10100110 -> 10100111 + 11000101 = 01101100
e) 7E		(16) - 2D	   (16) = 01111110 (2) - 00111101 = 11000010 -> 11000011 + 01111110 = 01000001
